name: Tuscor Lloyds
tag_list: shipping, transport, transportation, logistics, proejct-cargo, break-bulk, sea-freight, ocean-freight, ocean-transport
overview: Tuscor Lloyds is a shipping agent with a global reach. We successfully carry out hundreds of multimodal shipments every month, often to the world’s toughest destinations. Universally respected for their professional excellence and integrity, Tuscor Lloyds’ freight forwarding team has a wealth of specialist knowledge in Heavy Lift, Out of Gauge, Abnormal Loads, Conventional and Break Bulk shipments. We undertake regular Container (LCL and FCL) shipping for some of the planet’s largest corporations, as well as full and part ship chartering services for heavy industry and manufacturers all over the world. We also offer a variety of quality support services such as packing, depot storage and marine insurance.
